name: Spaceventure (xKayo, Mirage_Z, Laxene, Ubiiiiii)
description:
Spaceventure is an 80's arcade-inspired game, in which your goal is to shoot your way through endless waves of hostile UFOs and asteroids. Collect enough coins, buy useful upgrades for your spaceship and try to beat your own highscore.

The game is designed for Windows and can be played with either keyboard or gamepad. To play it simply download the file, extract it, start the .exe and enjoy!

Controls:




Move / Shoot / UltimatePlasmaShop

Spaceventure was created for the htk Game Jam | 2022 Fire Edition by five students.

Credits:

Ubiiiiii - Programming

Laxene - UI and Sounds

Mirage_Z - Assets and Animation

xKayo - Assets and Animation

Tabea - Startscreen

Music and SFX are from Epidemic Sound & We Love Indies
